msg: Fixed bug #8527. A closed TelnetAppender would continue waiting

author: ceki
msg: Corrected a bug in AppenderSkeleton.doAppend which did not prevent from
appending to a closed a appender.
New test case  AsyncAppenderTestCase. This test case uses VectorAppender
which is simpler to use then writing a regression test against a witness.

author: ceki
msg: Added support for resursive variable substitution in OptionConverter.java.
Minor changes so that more of log4j compiles under JDK 1.1. Changes mostly
related to the method in the Vector class.
Minor documentation changes and new comments in source code.

author: ceki
msg: SocketNode now used a BufferedInputStream as suggested by Kok Chong

author: ceki
msg: Fixed a problem with DailiyRollingAppender which would not
correctly compute the rollover period in certain timezones. [*]
